stimulusHtml: Interpretation of the data supports which of the following statements?

features.html:
A scientist used the amino acid sequence of cytochrome c in different species to consider evolutionary relationships.

The data below summarize the number of differences in the amino acid sequences of cytochrome c found in selected species.

choicesHtml: Rhesus monkeys are more closely related to rabbits than they are to horses.
Horses and cows have identical amino acid sequences in their cytochrome c.
Humans are more closely related to rabbits than they are to rhesus monkeys.
Plants and animals have no similarities at all.
Mammals are more closely related to reptiles than they are to fish.
